Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Class CommonDataKeys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.CommonDataKeys
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatformDataKeys

    public class CommonDataKeys
extends java.lang.Object
    Common data keys used as parameter for AnActionEvent.getData(DataKey) in AnAction.update(AnActionEvent)/AnAction.actionPerformed(AnActionEvent) implementations.
    See Also:
    com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.PlatformDataKeys}, com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.LangDataKeys}

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DataKey<Caret> CARET
      Returns caret instance (in host or injected editor, depending on context).
      static DataKey<Editor> EDITOR
      Returns currently focused editor instance.
      static DataKey<Editor> EDITOR_EVEN_IF_INACTIVE
      Returns editor even if focus currently is in find bar.
      static DataKey<java.lang.Boolean> EDITOR_VIRTUAL_SPACE
      Returns whether the current location relates to a virtual space in an editor.
      static DataKey<Editor> HOST_EDITOR
      Returns reference to host editor instance, in case EDITOR key is referring to an injected editor.

      Returns Navigatable instance.

      Returns several navigatables, e.g.

    • Field Detail

      • PROJECT

        public static final DataKey<Project> PROJECT

      • EDITOR

        public static final DataKey<Editor> EDITOR
        Returns currently focused editor instance.
        See Also:
        HOST_EDITOR, EDITOR_EVEN_IF_INACTIVE

      • HOST_EDITOR

        public static final DataKey<Editor> HOST_EDITOR
        Returns reference to host editor instance, in case EDITOR key is referring to an injected editor.

      • CARET

        public static final DataKey<Caret> CARET
        Returns caret instance (in host or injected editor, depending on context).

      • EDITOR_EVEN_IF_INACTIVE

        public static final DataKey<Editor> EDITOR_EVEN_IF_INACTIVE
        Returns editor even if focus currently is in find bar.

      • NAVIGATABLE

        public static final DataKey<Navigatable> NAVIGATABLE
        Returns Navigatable instance.

        If DataContext has a value for PSI_ELEMENT key which implements Navigatable it will automatically return it for this key if explicit value isn't provided.

      • NAVIGATABLE_ARRAY

        public static final DataKey<Navigatable[]> NAVIGATABLE_ARRAY
        Returns several navigatables, e.g. if several elements are selected in a component.

        Note that if DataContext has a value for NAVIGATABLE key it will automatically return single-element array for this key if explicit value isn't provided so there is no need to perform such wrapping by hand.

      • VIRTUAL_FILE

        public static final DataKey<VirtualFile> VIRTUAL_FILE
        Returns VirtualFile instance.

        Note that if DataContext has a value for PSI_FILE key it will automatically return the corresponding VirtualFile for this key if explicit value isn't provided. Also it'll return the containing file if a value for PSI_ELEMENT key is provided.

      • VIRTUAL_FILE_ARRAY

        public static final DataKey<VirtualFile[]> VIRTUAL_FILE_ARRAY
        Returns several VirtualFile instances, e.g. if several elements are selected in a component.

        Note that if DataContext doesn't have an explicit value for this key it will automatically collect VirtualFile instances corresponding to values provided for VIRTUAL_FILE, PSI_FILE, PSI_ELEMENT and other keys and return the array containing unique instances of the found files.

      • PSI_ELEMENT

        public static final DataKey<PsiElement> PSI_ELEMENT
        Returns PsiElement instance.

      • PSI_FILE

        public static final DataKey<PsiFile> PSI_FILE
        Returns currently selected PsiFile instance.

        Note that if DataContext has a value for VIRTUAL_FILE key it will automatically return the corresponding PsiFile for this key if explicit value isn't provided. Also it'll return the containing file if a value for PSI_ELEMENT key is provided.

      • EDITOR_VIRTUAL_SPACE

        public static final DataKey<java.lang.Boolean> EDITOR_VIRTUAL_SPACE
        Returns whether the current location relates to a virtual space in an editor.
        See Also:
        EditorSettings.setVirtualSpace(boolean)

      • CommonDataKeys

        public CommonDataKeys()
